content: I'm actually looking to buy a new pair of sneakers, specifically the limited-edition Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2. I recently purchased a pair from a friend who works at a local boutique store, and I got them for a discounted price of $250. They're so comfortable, and I've been wearing them almost every day since then. Do you have any tips on how to clean and maintain them to keep them looking their best?
